titles: The trauayled pylgrime bringing newes from all partes of the worlde, such like scarce harde of before. Seene and allowed according to the order appointed.
author: La Marche, Olivier de, ca. 1426-1502.
Batman, Stephen, d. 1584.
publisher: By Henrie Denham, dwelling in Pater-noster rowe, at the signe of the starre],
notes: A verse translation of: La Marche, Olivier de.  Le chevalier délibéré.
Translator's dedication signed: S.B., i.e. Stephen Batman.
Printer's name and address from colophon.
Running title reads: The trauailed pilgrime.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
